The guy is a legend.
Discuss his views.

item.title: Stephen fry's 20 minute talk on the Catholic church
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:4, topic:354569”]This clip is part of an entire debate which included Ann Widdecombe and some African priest speaking for the Catholic Church.

Even thought they clearly lost and made complete idiots of themselves, its still unfair that their side isn’t heard.
Saw the debate a few months ago. Is very good.

Entire debate: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZCdnh7G87m4&feature=PlayList&p=7CF8AFD815FFA216&index=0&playnext=1

My views on the subject are simply a matter of public record…[/quote]
yeah i posted it in the catholic church thread ages ago

Read full topic
item.source: Stephen fry's 20 minute talk on the Catholic church

item.title: Stephen fry's 20 minute talk on the Catholic church
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Nothing Stephen or Christopher said can be questioned. The Catholic Church as an organisation is a disgrace to morality and to humanity. It is a watch that stopped ticking long ago. Its purpose is fine in that we should all love one another, but that it then wishes to manipulate and control billions of people additionally only shows that it is a disgusting tyrant that has been long overdue destruction.

Read full topic
item.source: Stephen fry's 20 minute talk on the Catholic church

item.description:
@yakman wrote:

This clip is part of an entire debate which included Ann Widdecombe and some African priest speaking for the Catholic Church.

Even thought they clearly lost and made complete idiots of themselves, its still unfair that their side isn’t heard.
Saw the debate a few months ago. Is very good.

Entire debate: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZCdnh7G87m4&feature=PlayList&p=7CF8AFD815FFA216&index=0&playnext=1

My views on the subject are simply a matter of public record…
